units.name: Viper
units.prompt: Control chokepoints with traps. Place them between enemy positions and your allies. Use denial to block adjacent enemy abilities. Pulse groups when possible.

units.name: Veil
units.prompt: Cloak and move behind enemy lines. Target isolated enemies with shadow_strike. Save breach for the most dangerous enemy. Avoid being caught uncloaked.

units.name: Aegis
units.prompt: Push forward aggressively. Shield_wall facing the enemy cluster. If flanked, turn to face the biggest threat. Attack when possible.

player.placementPrompt: Place the tankiest unit center front. Ranged units in the back. Flankers on the edges.

units.name: Bolt
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Prioritize killing wounded enemies with precision_shot. If forced to move, retreat away from threats. Suppressing_fire to slow rushers.

units.name: Bulwark
units.prompt: Push forward aggressively. Shield_wall facing the enemy cluster. If flanked, turn to face the biggest threat. Attack when possible.

units.name: Insight
units.prompt: Use scan to reveal enemy prompts and cloaked units. Stay at max range (â‰¤4 tiles for scan). Use recalibrate on wounded allies to buff them. Keep distance from enemies and avoid adjacent vectors.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place aggressive units forward on one flank. Support units behind and toward center.
